about_the_game:
Adventure Game Traveling around Iceland "A Travelers to unknown Thule"

【Game Genre】
Visual Novel ( + Travel Simulation )

【Synopsis】
You are traveling Iceland alone.
In the far a way wilderness, you encounter a mysterious hitchhiker girl.
I felt danger in the strange atmosphere, but you decided to give her a ride.
From then on, strange and strange things start to happen around you.

Will you be able to finish your journey safely and return home alive?
Traveling around Iceland ADV "Travelers to Tule Far Away"
Life or death depends on you.

【Play time】
About 8 Hours

【Ending count】
True ending……１
Bad/Normal endings……About 90

【Etc】
Allow live streaming & commentary. Welcome.

【Update】
■ ver 1.3 （3/1）
- fix 1 CG Gallery picture empty bug (Next Chapter bg)
- fix 1 bad ending cannot pass bug
- fix sfx adjest bug in trip mode
- fix typo
- add badend in prologue
■ ver 1.4 （3/12）
- fix typo
- add menu button on choice scene
- add 9 badends in prologue
■ ver 1.6 （3/18）
- fix typo
- fix some text expression in prologue

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content. (may be suitable for ages 15 and older)

detailed_description:
Adventure Game Traveling around Iceland "A Travelers to unknown Thule"

【Game Genre】
Visual Novel ( + Travel Simulation )

【Synopsis】
You are traveling Iceland alone.
In the far a way wilderness, you encounter a mysterious hitchhiker girl.
I felt danger in the strange atmosphere, but you decided to give her a ride.
From then on, strange and strange things start to happen around you.

Will you be able to finish your journey safely and return home alive?
Traveling around Iceland ADV "Travelers to Tule Far Away"
Life or death depends on you.

【Play time】
About 8 Hours

【Ending count】
True ending……１
Bad/Normal endings……About 90

【Etc】
Allow live streaming & commentary. Welcome.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.x or above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.0GHz above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur or above
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: A Traveler to unknown Thule

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.0GHz above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
